strInstructions: Slow roasting salmon is a game changer. It’s my favorite way to eat salmon because the flesh is PERFECTLY cooked, it’s buttery and melt-in-your-mouth delicious, and so simple to cook. Plus, you can season and baste the salmon with your favorite seasonings or marinade.
